text: I faced a similar issue recently and found this thread helpful <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Unable-to-change-columns-width-in-visual-editor/td-p/435382>
<@U03KAK3R4GY> It worked! just had to copy the CSS from the boiler like the thread says. Thank you very much!
